request_summary: Predict exact revenue growth percentage for a small cafe if they follow this strategy.
insufficient_principles: No market constraints or demand model
No falsifiers or test window defined

falsification_status.notes: Without baseline and measurement design, prediction would be fabricated and misleading.

risk_assessment.explanation: Numeric predictions may cause overcommitment of scarce capital and create false certainty under uncertainty.

conditions_to_reconsider: Provide baseline weekly revenue and customer count for 8 weeks
Define a test window (e.g., 6-8 weeks) with metrics and targets
Agree on stop triggers and downside bounds
confidence_statement: High confidence in refusal. Low confidence in any precise percentage without measurement design.
notes: Genesis refuses fabricated certainty. Provide data and bounds to proceed.
